import callAPI from "../utils/apiCaller"; function Totalcart(props) { const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ callAPI('pay','POST',{user:localStorage.getItem('name')}) } return ( <>

  • Subtotal {props.s.current}.000VND
  • Total {props.s.current}.000VND
handleSubmit(e)}>PROCEED TO CHECKOUT
); } export default Totalcart;
